Name: E3 MB-20
Description:
DIGITAL CONSOLE MIXER 20 – General Features

  • Input channels include 16 Combo XLR, Channels 17/18 TRS stereo inputs, and Channels 19/20 USB/optical stereo inputs
  • 6 auxiliary sends
  • XLR / TRS / USB audio interface
  • Bluetooth version 5.0
  • Sampling rate output at 48 kHz, 24-bit
  • USB audio supports 32–96 kHz, 16–24 bit
  • 4-band EQ on each input channel
  • 7-band EQ on outputs
  • Built-in dual DSP effects engine
  • 2×16 preset and 2×16 customizable 24-bit effects
  • 7-inch touchscreen with 1280×800 resolution
  • 2 stereo outputs, 2 control outputs, and 6 auxiliary outputs
  • 2 main DCAs with auxiliary DCA grouping
  • One-key lock for the operation panel and system-wide ALL-MUTE function

Name: E3 MB-16
Description:
DIGITAL CONSOLE MIXER 16 – General Features

  • Input channels include 12 Combo XLR, Channels 13/14 TRS stereo inputs, and Channels 15/16 USB/optical stereo inputs
  • 6 auxiliary sends
  • XLR / TRS / USB audio interface
  • Bluetooth 5.0
  • Sampling rate output at 48 kHz, 24-bit
  • USB audio supports 32–96 kHz, 16–24 bit
  • 4-band EQ on each input channel
  • 7-band EQ on outputs
  • Inbuilt dual DSP effects engine
  • 2×16 preset and 2×16 customizable 24-bit effects
  • 7-inch touchscreen with 1280×800 resolution
  • 2 stereo outputs, 2 control outputs, and 6 auxiliary outputs
  • 2 main DCAs with auxiliary DCA grouping
  • One-key lock for the operation panel and system-wide ALL-MUTE function

Name: E3 MAL-16
Description:
• 16-channel mixer with 4 groups
  • 8 mono channels and 4 stereo channels with XLR and TRS inputs
  • 8 channels equipped with insert jacks
  • 12 channels with 48V phantom power supply
  • Channels 1–8 feature 3-band EQ with sweepable mid frequency
  • Channels 9–16 feature standard 3-band EQ (High/Mid/Low)
  • Each channel includes 3 AUX sends (Aux1, Aux2, Aux3/FX), with PRE function on Aux2
  • Quick MUTE keys and PFL function on all channels
  • 60 mm level faders for accurate control
  • Signal level display for stereo output, AUX output, group output, and monitor output
  • 32 preset DSP effects
  • USB audio processor system supporting U-disk playback, PC soundcard mode, and Bluetooth playback
  • Wide-range power supply 80–240V
  • Built on self-developed patented technology

Name: E3 MAL-12
Description:
• 12-channel mixer with 4 groups, suitable for live sound, conference halls, and small studios.
  • 4 mono channels and 4 stereo channels with XLR and TRS inputs.
  • 4 channels equipped with insert jacks, 80Hz low-cut filter, and built-in compressor.
  • All 12 channels support 48V phantom power, ideal for condenser microphones.
  • Powerful EQ section:
    • Channels 1–8: 3-band EQ (High / Mid / Low)
    • Channels 9–12: 2-band EQ (High / Low)
  • Each channel includes 2 AUX sends (Aux1 & Aux2/FX), with PRE function on Aux2.
  • Quick MUTE keys and PFL function on all channels.
  • 60mm level faders for precise control.
  • Signal level indicators for Stereo Output, AUX Output, Group Output, and Monitor Output.
  • Built-in 32 preset DSP effects.
  • USB audio system supporting:
    • U-disk playback
    • PC sound card mode
    • Bluetooth playback
  • Wide-range power supply 80–240V for global compatibility.
  • Self-developed patented technology.
